page.title: 17NORTH KILWORTH ORGANISATIONS
page.content: A number of cubs meet at the Village Hall.These include braches of the{ {Women's Institute}and the { {Mother's Union.}The {Evergreen Club} for the over 60s, and the {Keep Fit } class also meet there. There are weekly{whist drives}at the hall too. The {Rattle and Prattle Club,}for mothers with young children,meets in the Church Room.An {upholstery class} meet at Netherhall. The{Bowls Club}have their own clubhouse in Back Lane.The {Sports {Club}have a new clubhouse on the Rugby Road,where they have two football pitches and a cricket pitch.The { {Ladies Rounders Team}play there too. For the children, there are{Cub Scout and {Brownie Guide}packs.There is also a {Youth Club}which meets in the Village Hall.The Church run{Sunday {School}and {Quest} groups .
